cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 28th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 28th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our share rooms sleep 4 guests and has one bunk beds and two single beds. Polished wooden floors. Comfortable bedding provided with plenty of extra blankets for colder months. Free Wi-Fi

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our twin rooms have two single beds and polished wooden floors. The beds are made up and towels are provided. Brand new mattresses. A great choice for two friends travelling together wanting a private room with a glimpse of the ocean. Free WiFi.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This lovely room catches the morning sun. It has a small glimpse of the ocean. The room has tasteful furniture and polished kauri floors with a queen-size bed. All bedding and towels are supplied. Free WiFi.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Sunny larger room, with amazing sea-views. Queen-size bed, tasteful furnishings and polished kauri floors. All bedding and towels are supplied. Lie in bed, watch the surf roll in and dream to the sound of the waves. This is our best-selling room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
